channel.title: INDIR3CT - Dawn [Chill] [Electronic] [Wubs]
channel.description:
Hey everyone! This will be my last track till the new update :stuck_out_tongue: Here I worked on 6 note chords, and multiple melodies. I also recreated a high swing sound, but, the swing is at 0! A new discovery for me! I hope you enjoy it. And please, any feedback or comments would be awesome and much appreciated! Thanks!!
https://soundcloud.com/indir3ct/dawn

item.title: INDIR3CT - Dawn [Chill] [Electronic] [Wubs]
item.dc:creator: SpaghettiSauce
item.description:
It does change, but is only really noticeable with 8th notes. Try making an arpeggio and turning up and down the swing setting.

Read full topic

item.title: INDIR3CT - Dawn [Chill] [Electronic] [Wubs]
item.dc:creator: INDIR3CT
item.description:
I’ve done swinglike tracks before, but I’ve never made a track that whenever I changed the actuall swing settings of the track, the track doesn’t change at all lol

Read full topic

item.title: INDIR3CT - Dawn [Chill] [Electronic] [Wubs]
item.dc:creator: SpaghettiSauce
item.description:
Nice! Also, you can write swing(swung, swinged, swanged?) 8th notes as a quarter note and an eighth note in triplet form. Do you understand what I am saying? I was just surprised as to how you didn’t know that you didn’t need the swing setting to make swing.


like this

Read full topic
